pullrequest.title: Support for CCACHE option on Linux (with docker)

content.raw: I did not merge this PR because I'm not able to see improvements in the [gazebo build (3 and 4 runs)](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-no-gpu_ccache/plot/). I would sat that 1Gb of ccache is too low to see impact in the gazebo build but I still need to confirm it.
content.html: I did not merge this PR because I'm not able to see improvements in the gazebo build (3 and 4 runs). I would sat that 1Gb of ccache is too low to see impact in the gazebo build but I still need to confirm it.
